rationales.security: He plans to add exhausting late-night hours despite worsening back pain, reflecting unstable sustainability.
rationales.benevolence: He immediately commits to covering Priya's increased fees even at personal physical cost.

rationales.achievement: He proactively pursues higher-skill renovation work and demonstrates competence in a new opportunity.
rationales.security: The role offers steadier and better hourly income, reducing dependence on damaging late-night rides.
rationales.benevolence: His planning is explicitly tied to funding family needs while protecting his capacity to keep supporting them.

rationales.hedonism: He uses extra time for simple social enjoyment rather than immediately monetizing every free hour.
rationales.benevolence: He spends his surplus on a thoughtful gesture for the chess uncles who regularly welcome him.
He stays on the phone late to emotionally support Priya during a crisis despite his own early shift pressure.

rationales.achievement: He performs effectively at the site visit and secures recurring paid work from demonstrated skill.
rationales.security: The higher-rate, structured two-day schedule improves financial predictability and recovery time.

rationales.hedonism: He repeatedly sacrifices rest and bodily comfort, working through pain and swelling.
rationales.security: Keeping Priya's money for a real clinic visit reflects a concrete step toward maintaining his ability to keep working.
rationales.benevolence: He covers shifts for Suresh out of reciprocity and accepts Priya's gift to honor her effort rather than rejecting it.
